snippet: Shares of Eli Lilly dropped after the company announced it would stop developing a drug, while EMC stock was up on takeover news.
abstract: Stocks rise slightly in quiet trading day.
lead_paragraph: Shares of Eli Lilly dropped after the company announced it would stop developing a drug, while EMC stock was up on takeover news.

headline.main: Modest Gain for the Market as Earnings Season Nears
headline.print_headline: Slight Gains as Investors Focus on Coming Corporate Earnings Reports
